requirements.title: Quarterly Financial Statements
requirements.description: Borrower must deliver quarterly unaudited financial statements
requirements.plain_language_summary: Send your quarterly financial statements to the lender within 45 days after each quarter ends
requirements.original_text: Borrower shall deliver to Lender within forty-five (45) days after the end of each fiscal quarter...

requirements.title: Annual Audited Financials
requirements.description: Borrower must deliver annual audited financial statements
requirements.plain_language_summary: Have a CPA audit your financials and send the report within 120 days after year end
requirements.original_text: Borrower shall deliver to Lender within one hundred twenty (120) days after the end of each fiscal year, audited financial statements...

requirements.title: DSCR Covenant
requirements.description: Maintain minimum Debt Service Coverage Ratio
requirements.plain_language_summary: Your property's net operating income divided by your loan payments must be at least 1.25x
requirements.original_text: Borrower shall maintain a Debt Service Coverage Ratio of not less than 1.25:1.00...

requirements.title: Property Insurance
requirements.description: Maintain property insurance with specified coverage
requirements.plain_language_summary: Keep your property insured for full replacement cost. Send proof to lender before each renewal.
requirements.original_text: Borrower shall maintain property insurance in an amount not less than the full replacement cost...

requirements.title: Replacement Reserve Deposits
requirements.plain_language_summary: Deposit $2,500 monthly into your replacement reserve account
requirements.original_text: Borrower shall deposit with Lender on each Payment Date the sum of $2,500...

requirements.title: Monthly Rent Roll
requirements.plain_language_summary: Send a current rent roll showing all tenants, lease terms, and rental rates by the 15th of each month
requirements.original_text: Borrower shall deliver to Lender by the fifteenth (15th) day of each calendar month a current rent roll...

requirements.title: Major Lease Approval
requirements.description: Lender approval required for major leases
requirements.plain_language_summary: Get lender approval before signing any lease over 10,000 SF or with a tenant getting more than 3 months free rent
requirements.original_text: Borrower shall not enter into any lease for more than 10,000 square feet or containing concessions in excess of three (3) months free rent without Lender's prior written consent...

requirements.title: Annual Operating Budget
requirements.plain_language_summary: Submit next year's operating budget for lender approval by November 15th each year
requirements.original_text: Not later than November 15 of each year, Borrower shall submit to Lender for approval the proposed annual operating budget...
